text: Boon Lay MRT station is a Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) station on the East West line (EWL) in Jurong West, Singapore. At first it was announced as Jurong West MRT station, the station was stopped before the decision was reversed in August 1987. The EWL station opened on 6 July 1990 and was the last station to be completed on the initial MRT network. Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore)
title: Boon Lay MRT station
